name: Puni! (GGJ HK 2022)
description:
Controls & Rules

⬅️⬆️⬇️➡️ - Move Puni!
Z - Spin clockwise!
X - Spin anti-clockwise!

Warm up or cool down the sad spirits with Puni's elements, bring the forest back into balance!

Credits

Developed by BlueTieCasual (Hello!)
Developed in 10 days as part of Global Game Jam Hong Kong 2022 with the theme of Duality.
